help.title: Spitfire Mk.II
help.line: 3. Handbrake off - b (and shift b for on)
1. Manual adjust prop pitch using - n and shift n (do keep it below 3000rpm)
2. plane will auto mixture (because I said so)
1. Flaps down 30 degs - ] (not over 120mph and push the stick forward)
2. Flaps down 90 degs - ]] (push the stick fully forward !)
3. Flaps up - [ (full trottle and pray to God !)
4. For landing put the throttle to where it stops that anoying noise
5. DON'T FORGET TO LOWER THE LANDING GEAR !
